summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GoGarvis application - backend APIs and frontend UI functionality. All core features working correctly with minor mobile navigation issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor navigation stability issue in mobile view - dashboard link click timeout
ui_bugs.details: Element becomes unstable/outside viewport during mobile navigation, causing click timeout. Does not affect core functionality.

passed_tests: Dashboard stats API (18 docs, 30 terms, 8 components)
Documents API with search and categories
Glossary API with search and categories
AI Chat API with GPT-5.2 integration
All 6 pages accessible (Dashboard, Docs, Architecture, Chat, Glossary, Settings)
AI chat message sending and response

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - 1 minor mobile navigation issue)
